title: TEST-001-Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can login with valid email and password.
code:
import asyncio
from playwright import async_api
from playwright.async_api import expect

async def run_test():
    pw = None
    browser = None
    context = None
    
    try:
        # Start a Playwright session in asynchronous mode
        pw = await async_api.async_playwright().start()
        
        # Launch a Chromium browser in headless mode with custom arguments
        browser = await pw.chromium.launch(
            headless=True,
            args=[
                "--window-size=1280,720",         # Set the browser window size
                "--disable-dev-shm-usage",        # Avoid using /dev/shm which can cause issues in containers
                "--ipc=host",                     # Use host-level IPC for better stability
                "--single-process"                # Run the browser in a single process mode
            ],
        )
        
        # Create a new browser context (like an incognito window)
        context = await browser.new_context()
        context.set_default_timeout(5000)
        
        # Open a new page in the browser context
        page = await context.new_page()
        
        # Navigate to your target URL and wait until the network request is committed
        await page.goto("http://localhost:3000", wait_until="commit", timeout=10000)
        
        # Wait for the main page to reach DOMContentLoaded state (optional for stability)
        try:
            await page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
        except async_api.Error:
            pass
        
        # Iterate through all iframes and wait for them to load as well
        for frame in page.frames:
            try:
                await frame.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
            except async_api.Error:
                pass
        
        # Interact with the page elements to simulate user flow
        # -> Input valid email and password, then click Sign In button.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input valid email address
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('siddique@digibrantders.com')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input valid password
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div[2]/div[2]/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('Admin@12345')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click the Sign In button
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/form/div[2]/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # --> Assertions to verify final state
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Dashboard').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=ðŸ‘‹ Morning! Siddique').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Admin').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=14%').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Complete your profile').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Add your professional documents to verify your account').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Complete Now').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=No requirementsthis month').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=No tasksthis month').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Unable to load meetings at the moment. Please connect to Teams.').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=No notes yet').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Create one').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=No leaves to display at the moment').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Select Task').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Design System Planning').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Login successful!').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await asyncio.sleep(5)
    
    finally:
        if context:
            await context.close()
        if browser:
            await browser.close()
        if pw:
            await pw.stop()
            
asyncio.run(run_test())

title: TEST-002-Verify Dashboard Loading
description: Verify that the dashboard loads correctly after login and displays key elements.
code:
import asyncio
from playwright import async_api
from playwright.async_api import expect

async def run_test():
    pw = None
    browser = None
    context = None
    
    try:
        # Start a Playwright session in asynchronous mode
        pw = await async_api.async_playwright().start()
        
        # Launch a Chromium browser in headless mode with custom arguments
        browser = await pw.chromium.launch(
            headless=True,
            args=[
                "--window-size=1280,720",         # Set the browser window size
                "--disable-dev-shm-usage",        # Avoid using /dev/shm which can cause issues in containers
                "--ipc=host",                     # Use host-level IPC for better stability
                "--single-process"                # Run the browser in a single process mode
            ],
        )
        
        # Create a new browser context (like an incognito window)
        context = await browser.new_context()
        context.set_default_timeout(5000)
        
        # Open a new page in the browser context
        page = await context.new_page()
        
        # Navigate to your target URL and wait until the network request is committed
        await page.goto("http://localhost:3000", wait_until="commit", timeout=10000)
        
        # Wait for the main page to reach DOMContentLoaded state (optional for stability)
        try:
            await page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
        except async_api.Error:
            pass
        
        # Iterate through all iframes and wait for them to load as well
        for frame in page.frames:
            try:
                await frame.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
            except async_api.Error:
                pass
        
        # Interact with the page elements to simulate user flow
        # -> Input email and password, then click Sign In button to login.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input email address
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div/div/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('siddique@digibrantders.com')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Input password
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/form/div/div[2]/div[2]/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('Admin@12345')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click Sign In button
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/form/div[2]/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # --> Assertions to verify final state
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Dashboard').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Employees').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Partners').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Workspace').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Requirements').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Tasks').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Reports').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Calendar').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Leaves').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Finance').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Notes').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Upgrade Now').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=ðŸ‘‹ Morning! Siddique').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await expect(frame.locator('text=Login successful!').first).to_be_visible(timeout=30000)
        await asyncio.sleep(5)
    
    finally:
        if context:
            await context.close()
        if browser:
            await browser.close()
        if pw:
            await pw.stop()
            
asyncio.run(run_test())
